title: High Ping

embed.description: Imgur: The most awesome images on the Internet.

body:
Recently, I've been getting lots of lag spikes and high pings when playing LoL - but only in LoL.
Here's a screenshot of LoL (with ping 487) and a terminal pinging google.com

Any suggestion on what/if anything can be done, thanks :)

replies.body:
Since Google and League servers reside in different geolocations, this is likely caused by a specific network routing issues to League's servers only. Before we take a deep look at your network routing, I recommend working through our [**connection guide**](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues) to ensure all your local network settings are compatible with League.

Let me know if this resolved your issue or not.

Remember that until around the middle of January, everyone's home for Christmas, so naturally your ping should increase somewhat. 487 ms might be a result of not resetting your router for a long time, or maybe the router is simply malfunctioning. Check Riot's site for more info on how you can optimize your connection, and let me know if it goes back down to normal either late at night, or in a couple of weeks when everyone is either asleep or back at work. 

Here is the article to check: https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues
